urls.title: Flooding - updates
urls.description: The Amber weather warning across the whole of the county means communities across the Derbyshire Dales need to be on flood alert over the coming days. Particular areas of concern highlighted by the Environment Agency are Bakewell, Baslow and Matlock. As always, the big message is BE PREPARED - see the advice on our website.
